title: There are auto shields in DOTA and SMITE...The problem isn't the shield... its the duration
body:
Why should any automatic life saving shield last any longer then 1 second?

It leaves no room for counter play. You either try to burn through a shield that last 5 seconds or you literally dont attack for 5 seconds. Either way, there is 0 counterplay.

replies.body: Health is a shield that lasts forever so long as you don't take damage.
